hero.name: Jake Callcut
hero.title: Designer & Developer
hero.tagline: Building thoughtful digital products with equal parts design and engineering.

about.bio: I’m a software engineer with a passion for blending design and technology. With experience spanning mobile apps, embedded systems, and full-stack development, I enjoy solving complex problems and delivering polished, human-centered solutions. Outside of work, I’m always learning new tools and exploring how technology can make everyday life a little easier.

bullets: Developed an iOS app that uses NFC tiles and encrypted payloads to trigger custom shortcuts and actions.
Introduced modern DevOps workflows that reduced release friction and improved reliability.
Developed software to support healthcare technology used in clinical environments.
Worked closely with engineers and medical staff to ensure safety-critical compliance.

education.grade: On track for First Class Honours

education.Programme: A Levels: Maths, Physics, Computer Science

projects.name: Lumina
projects.description: A smart home system integrating IoT hardware with a mobile app. Lumina enables users to control and automate devices through a sleek Flutter interface while syncing with a Raspberry Pi-powered hub in real time.

projects.name: Selbury
projects.description: Selbury is a UK-focused compliance SaaS platform designed to help small businesses understand and manage their legal obligations. By combining a tailored compliance radar, plain-English regulation summaries, and a simple tracking dashboard.

contact.note: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or side projects. Drop me a message and let's chat!
